data.name: Heat Runner
data.detailed_description:
RAGE GAMES NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR BROKEN SPACEBARS!!!!!!!!!!!

BRIEF RUNDOWN --- Heat Runner offers fun but CHALLENGING Floor is Lava action. Across 5 chapters, Run and jump across various platforms, buildings, and more. Meanwhile discovering the secrets behind L-labs diabolical operation.

DETAILED DESCRIPTION --- Play as a former free-running social media influencer as he was hired on by an unknown resistance to try and thwart the corrupted company L-labs operations. The CEO intends to over-flow the earth with lava, effectively wiping out the human race. Jump through sinking and destroyed buildings, destroy L-labs's Generators, and explore a vast city, and uncover their motives. The fate of the world... lies with you.

data.short_description: Exciting, Cartoony, Floor is lava adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the min. Requirements for Unreal Engine 4 we're not yet sure of the game in specific
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce (GTX) 1650 4GB or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the specs of the PC the game is being built on.
